meanings.sent1: The arithmeticians calculated the total cost of the groceries.
meanings.sent2: The arithmeticians at the bank helped customers with their financial transactions.
meanings.sent3: The arithmeticians had a friendly competition to see who could solve math problems the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of numbers, the arithmeticians were the wizards casting spells of addition and subtraction.
meanings.sent5: The arithmeticians' precision in calculations was unmatched.

meanings.sent1: Many arithmeticians gathered at the conference to discuss new teaching methods.
meanings.sent2: The arithmeticians' expertise in math made them valuable assets to the company.
meanings.sent3: The arithmeticians formed a club to share their love for numbers and problem-solving.
meanings.sent4: In the classroom, the arithmeticians were like a team of superheroes, each with their own special math power.
meanings.sent5: The arithmeticians' dedication to their craft was evident in every equation they solved.
